item.title: ADFS WAP: Resolve TCP reset errors connected to wildcard certificate usage
item.description: ADFS is a confusing technology that frequently causes frustration. This post documents an instance of that and hopefully helps someone else along the way.

item.title: Microsoft's foray into mDNS is introducing new security issues
item.description: Microsoft has decided to go against its better judgement and enable mDNS on Windows by default. Since nobody else seems to have analyzed why this is such as bad decision, I decided to do so. It’s not great.
